ThingDef.label: Twilight Sparkle (unicorn)
ThingDef.description:
Before she became the Princess of Friendship, Twilight Sparkle was one of the most powerful unicorns in Equestria; there are many who say she was almost as powerful as Princess Celestia herself.

Carrying her makes you feel as though you have more control over your own magical abilities.

Max Energy: +15%
Energy Regen: +15%
Ability Cooldown: -10%
